visualobjects

Class VisualObject<L extends LogicalObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualobjects.VisualObject<L>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, DeleteListener, DeleteSubject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssociationHandle, Container, FormObjectWrapper, PaddingBox, ResizableAndMovableVisualObject, TextWrapper, VisualAssociation

    public abstract class VisualObject<L extends LogicalObject>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeleteListener, DeleteSubject, Typable
    A class of Visual objects, involving three coordinates, a width and height, a list of children, a parent, a logical object, a collection of deleteListeners, a selected state and a deleted state. This is a class for the objects that will visually represent the logical objects of our program and thus will be drawn on a canvas.
    Author:
    team 11

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  VisualObject.VisualObjectComparator
      A class of VisualObjectComparators which compares visual objects by their z-coordinates.

      • VisualObject

        public VisualObject(int x,
                    int y,
                    int z,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    VisualObject<?> parent,
                    Controller controller)
        Constructs a new visual object with the stated coordinates, width, height and parent. Also updates the children of the stated parent, if it is not null.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the visual object
        y - the y-coordinate of the visual object
        z - the z-coordinate of the visual object
        width - the width of the visual object
        height - the height of the visual object
        parent - the parent visual object of this visual object
